name: Infostellar Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud-based satellite antenna-sharing platform designed to provide convenient, efficient communications infrastructure for humanity's ongoing space expansion. The company's platform helps in transmission at a lower cost while passing on revenue to antenna owners in the network, enabling businesses to share their antennas during idle time.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based satellite antenna-sharing platform designed to provide convenient, efficient communications infrastructure for humanity's ongoing space expansion. The company's platform helps in transmission at a lower cost while passing on revenue to antenna owners in the network, enabling businesses to share their antennas during idle time.
